trans-unit.source: Represents a serial port resource.
trans-unit.target: 表示串行端口资源。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to control a serial port file resource.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于控制串行端口文件资源。

trans-unit.source: This class provides synchronous and event-driven I/O, access to pin and break states, and access to serial driver properties.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供同步和事件驱动 I/O、 对插针和中断状态的访问和对串行驱动程序属性的访问。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the functionality of this class can be wrapped in an internal <xref:System.IO.Stream> object, accessible through the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property, and passed to classes that wrap or use streams.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此类的功能可以包装在内部<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象，可通过访问<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性，并将传递给包装或使用流的类。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The SerialPort class supports the following encodings: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, and any encoding defined in mscorlib.dll where the code page is less than 50000 or the code page is 54936.
trans-unit.target: 无效/不类支持以下编码︰ <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>， <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>，并在其中的代码页是小于 50000 或代码页是 54936 mscorlib.dll 中定义任何编码。</xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding> </xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> </xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>

trans-unit.source: You can use alternate encodings, but you must use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Write%2A> method and perform the encoding yourself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用备用编码，但必须使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Write%2A>方法并执行自己的编码。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Write%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> method to retrieve the valid ports for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>方法来检索当前计算机的有效端口。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a SerialPort object becomes blocked during a read operation, do not abort the thread.
trans-unit.target: 在读取操作过程中阻止变得无效/不对象，如果未中止此线程。

trans-unit.source: Instead, either close the base stream or dispose of the SerialPort object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，请关闭基流处理或释放无效/不对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for a <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Use this property for explicit asynchronous I/O operations or to pass the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object to a <xref:System.IO.Stream> wrapper class such as <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性用于显式异步 I/O 操作，或要传递<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>到<xref:System.IO.Stream>如<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>的包装器类</xref:System.IO.Stream>的对象</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Any open serial port's BaseStream property returns an object that derives from the abstract <xref:System.IO.Stream> class, and implements read and write methods using the prototypes inherited from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class: <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 任何打开串行端口 BaseStream 属性将返回一个对象，派生自抽象<xref:System.IO.Stream>类，并实现读取和写入方法使用继承自的原型<xref:System.IO.Stream>类︰ <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>。</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: These methods can be useful when passing a wrapped serial resource to a <xref:System.IO.Stream> wrapper class.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法很有用，当将已包装的串行资源传递给<xref:System.IO.Stream>包装类。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Due to the inaccessibility of the wrapped file handle, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> properties are not supported, and the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A> methods are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 由于无法访问经过的已包装的文件句柄，<xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>不支持属性，与<xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A>不支持的方法。</xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭。

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会因为<> *1> 尚未调用方法或<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The stream is in a .NET Compact Framework application and one of the following methods was called: <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead*> <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite*> <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead*> <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite*> The .NET Compact Framework does not support the asynchronous model with base streams.
trans-unit.target: 流是在.NET Compact Framework 应用程序中，已调用以下方法之一︰ <> </> *1> <> </> *1> <> </> *1> <> </> *1> 的.NET Compact Framework 不支持具有基流的异步模型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the serial baud rate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置串行波特率。

trans-unit.source: The baud rate must be supported by the user's serial driver.
trans-unit.target: 用户的串行驱动程序必须支持波特率。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 9600 bits per second (bps).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 9600 每秒位数 (bps)。

trans-unit.source: The baud rate.
trans-unit.target: 波特率。

trans-unit.source: The baud rate specified is less than or equal to zero, or is greater than the maximum allowable baud rate for the device.
trans-unit.target: 指定的波特率小于或等于零，或大于此设备的最大允许波特率。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the break signal state.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中断信号状态。

trans-unit.source: The break signal state occurs when a transmission is suspended and the line is placed in a break state (all low, no stop bit) until released.
trans-unit.target: 如果传输已挂起，行处于中断状态 （无停止位中的所有低） 会出现中断信号状态直到释放。

trans-unit.source: To enter a break state, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要输入中断状态，请将此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the port is already in a break state, setting this property again to `true` does not result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果端口处于中断状态已为，再次设置此属性`true`不会导致异常。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to write to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object while BreakState is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不能写入<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象 BreakState 时`true`。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the port is in a break state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果端口处于中断状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭。

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会因为<> *1> 尚未调用方法或<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes of data in the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取接收缓冲区中的数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The receive buffer includes the serial driver's receive buffer as well as internal buffering in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 接收缓冲区包括串行驱动程序的接收缓冲区，以及在内部缓冲<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象本身。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Because the BytesToRead property represents both the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> buffer and the Windows-created buffer, it can return a greater value than the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> property, which represents only the Windows-created buffer.
trans-unit.target: 因为 BytesToRead 属性表示同时<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>缓冲区和 Windows 创建缓冲区，它可返回较大的值，比<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>属性，它表示仅 Windows 创建的缓冲区。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data in the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 接收缓冲区中的数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 未打开端口。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes of data in the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取发送缓冲区中的数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The send buffer includes the serial driver's send buffer as well as internal buffering in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 发送缓冲区包括串行驱动程序的发送缓冲区，以及在内部缓冲<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象本身。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data in the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: 发送缓冲区中的数据的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 端口处于无效状态。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭。

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会因为<> *1> 尚未调用方法或<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the Carrier Detect line for the port.
trans-unit.target: 获取端口的载波检测行的状态。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to monitor the state of the carrier detection line for a port.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于监视端口的载波检测行的状态。

trans-unit.source: No carrier usually indicates that the receiver has hung up and the carrier has been dropped.
trans-unit.target: 没有承运人通常指示接收方已挂断且载波已被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the carrier is detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果检测到载波，则;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭。

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会因为<> *1> 尚未调用方法或<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Closes the port connection, sets the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, and disposes of the internal <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: 关闭端口连接，设置<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen*>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，并释放内部<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象。</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method closes the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object and clears both the receive and transmit buffers.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法关闭<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象并清除这两个接收并传输缓冲区。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose?displayProperty=fullName> method, which invokes the protected <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose?displayProperty=fullName>方法，该调用受保护方法<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The best practice for any application is to wait for some amount of time after calling the Close method before attempting to call the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A> method, as the port may not be closed instantly.
trans-unit.target: 任何应用程序的最佳做法是等待一定的时间后尝试调用之前调用 Close 方法<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A>方法，为端口可能不会关闭立即。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the Clear-to-Send line.
trans-unit.target: 获取清除发送行的状态。

trans-unit.source: The Clear-to-Send (CTS) line is used in Request to Send/Clear to Send (RTS/CTS) hardware handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 清除到发送 (CTS) 行用于发送/清除的请求中发送 (RTS/CTS) 硬件握手。

trans-unit.source: The CTS line is queried by a port before data is sent.
trans-unit.target: 发送数据前，将通过非端口查询 CTS 行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Clear-to-Send line is detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果检测到明文发送行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭。

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会因为<> *1> 尚未调用方法或<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the standard length of data bits per byte.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标准每个字节的数据位长度。

trans-unit.source: The range of values for this property is from 5 through 8.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值范围是从 5 至 8。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 8。

trans-unit.source: The data bits length.
trans-unit.target: 数据位长度。

trans-unit.source: The data bits value is less than 5 or more than 8.
trans-unit.target: 数据位值是小于 5 个或多个 8。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that data has been received through a port represented by the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指示已通过由端口接收数据<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Data events can be caused by any of the items in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 数据事件可以由任何中的项<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData>枚举。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData>

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system determines whether to raise this event or not, not all parity errors may be reported.
trans-unit.target: 由于操作系统决定是否以引发此事件，或不，并非所有的奇偶校验错误可能会报告。

trans-unit.source: The DataReceived event is also raised if an Eof character is received, regardless of the number of bytes in the internal input buffer and the value of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收 Eof 字符，而不考虑内部输入缓冲区中的字节数和的值，也会引发 DataReceived 事件<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A>属性。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>, DataReceived, and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> events may be called out of order, and there may be a slight delay between when the underlying stream reports the error and when the event handler is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>DataReceived，和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived>事件可能被调用无序，并且可能有基础流时报告错误和事件处理程序执行时之间稍有延迟。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived></xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>

trans-unit.source: Only one event handler can execute at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只能有一个事件处理程序可以执行一次。

trans-unit.source: The DataReceived event is not guaranteed to be raised for every byte received.
trans-unit.target: 不保证 DataReceived 事件的每个接收的字节引发。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property to determine how much data is left to be read in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>属性来确定多少数据会保留在缓冲区中读取。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataReceived event is raised on a secondary thread when data is received from the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: 从收到数据时，DataReceived 事件将在辅助线程中引发<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised on a secondary thread, and not the main thread, attempting to modify some elements in the main thread, such as UI elements, could raise a threading exception.
trans-unit.target: 因为在辅助线程和非主线程，尝试修改主线程，如 UI 元素中的某些元素上引发此事件可能会产生线程处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to modify elements in the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post change requests back using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, which will do the work on the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要修改当中，该元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>和返回使用 post 更改请求<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，这将执行在合适的线程上工作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 null 字节在端口和接收缓冲区之间传输时是否被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>调用与受保护的 Dispose 方法`disposing`参数设置为`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> references.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the Data Set Ready (DSR) signal.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据设置就绪 (DSR) 信号的状态。

trans-unit.source: This property is used in Data Set Ready/Data Terminal Ready (DSR/DTR) handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于数据设置就绪/数据终端就绪 (DSR/DTR) 握手。

trans-unit.source: The Data Set Ready (DSR) signal is usually sent by a modem to a port to indicate that it is ready for data transmission or data reception.
trans-unit.target: 数据设置就绪 (DSR) 信号通常由发送调制解调器到端口以指示它是准备好进行数据传输或接收数据的步骤。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a Data Set Ready signal has been sent to the port; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据设置就绪信号已发送到端口，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.

trans-unit.target: 这可能会因为<> *1> 尚未调用方法或<> *1> 调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables the Data Terminal Ready (DTR) signal during serial communication.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，在串行通信过程中启用数据终端就绪 (DTR) 信号。

trans-unit.source: Data Terminal Ready (DTR) is typically enabled during XON/XOFF software handshaking and Request to Send/Clear to Send (RTS/CTS) hardware handshaking, and modem communications.
trans-unit.target: XON/XOFF 软件握手和发送/清除请求发送 (RTS/CTS) 硬件握手和调制解调器通信过程中通常会启用数据终端就绪 (DTR)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable Data Terminal Ready (DTR); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要启用数据终端就绪 (DTR);否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the byte encoding for pre- and post-transmission conversion of text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置传输前后文本转换的字节编码。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoding>对象。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>。</xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>

trans-unit.source: The Encoding property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 编码属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Encoding property was set to an encoding that is not <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, one of the Windows single byte encodings, or one of the Windows double byte encodings.
trans-unit.target: 编码属性设置为不编码<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>， <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>、 一个 Windows 单字节编码中，或某个 Windows 双字节编码。</xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> </xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an error has occurred with a port represented by a <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指示由表示的端口已发生错误<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Error events can be caused by any of the items in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialError> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 错误事件可以由任何中的项原因引起<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialError>枚举。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialError>

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system determines whether to raise this event or not, not all parity errors may be reported.
trans-unit.target: 由于操作系统决定是否以引发此事件，或不，并非所有的奇偶校验错误可能会报告。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>, and ErrorReceived events may be called out of order, and there may be a slight delay between when the underlying stream reports the error and when code can when the event handler is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged><xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>，和 ErrorReceived 事件可能被调用无序，并且可能有基础流时报告错误，并且当代码可以执行事件处理程序时之间稍有延迟。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived></xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>

trans-unit.source: Only one event handler can execute at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只能有一个事件处理程序可以执行一次。

trans-unit.source: If a parity error occurs on the trailing byte of a stream, an extra byte will be added to the input buffer with a value of 126.
trans-unit.target: 如果流的尾随字节在发生奇偶校验错误，将向输入一个值为 126 缓冲区添加的额外字节。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorReceived event is raised on a secondary thread when an error is received from the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: 从收到错误时，ErrorReceived 事件将在辅助线程中引发<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised on a secondary thread, and not the main thread, attempting to modify some elements in the main thread, such as UI elements, could raise a threading exception.
trans-unit.target: 因为在辅助线程和非主线程，尝试修改主线程，如 UI 元素中的某些元素上引发此事件可能会产生线程处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to modify elements in the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post change requests back using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, which will do the work on the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要修改当中，该元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>和返回使用 post 更改请求<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，这将执行在合适的线程上工作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of serial port names for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前计算机的串行端口名的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of serial port names for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: 当前计算机的串行端口名的数组。

trans-unit.source: The serial port names could not be queried.
trans-unit.target: 无法查询的串行端口名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the handshaking protocol for serial port transmission of data using a value from <xref href="System.IO.Ports.Handshake"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置串行端口使用中的一个值的数据传输的握手协议<xref href="System.IO.Ports.Handshake"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When handshaking is used, the device connected to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object is instructed to stop sending data when there is at least (<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>-1024) bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 当使用握手时，该设备已连接到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象指示以停止在没有至少时才发送数据 (<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>-1024) 缓冲区中的字节。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The device is instructed to start sending data again when there are 1024 or fewer bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 设备将指示重新开始发送数据时缓冲区中有 1024年或更少字节。

trans-unit.source: If the device is sending data in blocks that are larger than 1024 bytes, this may cause the buffer to overflow.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备在大于 1024 个字节的块中发送数据，这可能导致缓冲区溢出。

trans-unit.source: If the Handshake property is set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A> is set to `false`, the XOff character will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果握手属性设置为<xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A>设置为`false`，将不会发送 XOff 字符。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A> is then set to `true`, more data must be sent before the XOff character will be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A>然后将设置为`true`，将发送 XOff 字符之前必须发送更多的数据。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.CtsHolding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the open or closed status of the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值的打开或关闭状态<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The IsOpen property tracks whether the port is open for use by the caller, not whether the port is open by any application on the machine.
trans-unit.target: IsOpen 属性跟踪是否端口处于打开状态以供调用方，不端口是否被任何应用程序在计算机上打开。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the serial port is open; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果串行端口已打开状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 传递的 IsOpen 值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value used to interpret the end of a call to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine*> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine*> methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于解释的末尾调用值<> *1> 和<> *1> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This property determines what value (byte) defines the end of a line for the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定哪些值 （字节） 定义的行的末尾<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A>方法。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default the end-of-line value is <xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下结束的行值为<xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A>。</xref:System.Environment.NewLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: You would change this to a different value if the particular serial device you’re working with uses a different value for the same purpose.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在使用的特定串行设备实现同一目的使用不同的值，将更改为不同的值这种情况。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the end of a line.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示行尾的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is a line feed, <xref:System.Environment.NewLine*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为换行符， <xref:System.Environment.NewLine*>.</xref:System.Environment.NewLine*>

trans-unit.target: 属性值为空。

trans-unit.target: 该属性值将<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new serial port connection.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个新的串行端口连接。

trans-unit.source: Only one open connection can exist per <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: 每个只能存在一个打开的连接<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The best practice for any application is to wait for some amount of time after calling the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A> method before attempting to call the Open method, as the port may not be closed instantly.
trans-unit.target: 任何应用程序的最佳做法是等待一定的时间之后调用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>方法，然后再尝试调用 Open 方法中，端口可能不会立即关闭。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: One or more of the properties for this instance are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个此实例的属性均无效。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Parity*>, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataBits*>, or <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake*> properties are not valid values; the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaudRate*> is less than or equal to zero; the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout*> or <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.WriteTimeout*> property is less than zero and is not <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，或<> *1> 属性不是有效的值; <> </> *1> 小于或等于零; <> </> *1> 或<> *1> 属性为小于零且不<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 上的当前实例的指定的端口<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>已打开。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parity-checking protocol.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置奇偶校验检查协议。

trans-unit.source: Parity is an error-checking procedure in which the number of 1s must always be the same—either even or odd—for each group of bits that is transmitted without error.
trans-unit.target: 奇偶校验是在其中为 1 的数必须始终是相同的错误检查的过程-偶数还是奇数-每个组的 bits 传输而未出现错误。

trans-unit.source: In modem-to-modem communications, parity is often one of the parameters that must be agreed upon by sending parties and receiving parties before transmission can take place.
trans-unit.target: 在调制解调器的通信，奇偶校验通常是必须同意通过发送方和接收方传输才能使放置的参数之一。

trans-unit.source: If a parity error occurs on the trailing byte of a stream, an extra byte will be added to the input buffer with a value of 126.
trans-unit.target: 如果流的尾随字节在发生奇偶校验错误，将向输入一个值为 126 缓冲区添加的额外字节。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that represents the parity-checking protocol.
trans-unit.target: 表示奇偶校验检查协议的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.IO.Ports.Parity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.IO.Ports.Parity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Parity value passed is not a valid value in the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.Parity"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 传递的奇偶校验值不是有效的值中<xref href="System.IO.Ports.Parity"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the byte that replaces invalid bytes in a data stream when a parity error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在发生奇偶校验错误时替换数据流中的无效字节的字节。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to the null character, parity replacement is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值设置为 null 字符，奇偶校验替换被禁用。

trans-unit.source: A byte that replaces invalid bytes.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节，用于替换无效字节。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a non-data signal event has occurred on the port represented by the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 指示在所表示的端口上发生了非数据信号事件<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Serial pin changed events can be caused by any of the items in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 串行 pin 更改事件可以由任何中的项<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange>枚举。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange>

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system determines whether to raise this event or not, not all parity errors may be reported.
trans-unit.target: 由于操作系统决定是否以引发此事件，或不，并非所有的奇偶校验错误可能会报告。

trans-unit.source: As part of the event, the new value of the pin is set.
trans-unit.target: 作为事件的一部分，设置 pin 的新值。

trans-unit.source: The PinChanged event is raised when a <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object enters the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>, but not when the port exits the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 将引发 PinChanged 事件时<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象进入<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>，但不是退出时端口<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BreakState%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to other values in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于中的其他值<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange>枚举。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPinChange>

trans-unit.source: PinChanged, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>, and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> events may be called out of order, and there may be a slight delay between when the underlying stream reports the error and when the event handler is executed.
trans-unit.target: PinChanged， <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>，和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived>事件可能被调用无序，并且可能有基础流时报告错误和事件处理程序执行时之间稍有延迟。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>

trans-unit.source: Only one event handler can execute at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只能有一个事件处理程序可以执行一次。

trans-unit.source: The PinChanged event is raised on a secondary thread.
trans-unit.target: 在辅助线程上引发 PinChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised on a secondary thread, and not the main thread, attempting to modify some elements in the main thread, such as UI elements, could raise a threading exception.
trans-unit.target: 因为在辅助线程和非主线程，尝试修改主线程，如 UI 元素中的某些元素上引发此事件可能会产生线程处理的异常。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to modify elements in the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post change requests back using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, which will do the work on the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要修改当中，该元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>和返回使用 post 更改请求<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，这将执行在合适的线程上工作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 读取字节的字节数<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>输入的缓冲区并将这些字节写入字节数组中指定的偏移量处。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要读取文本和从流中读取二进制数据之间进行切换，选择一种协议，仔细定义文本和二进制数据，如手动读取字节和解码数据之间的边界。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类放入缓冲区的数据，而流中包含<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性不、 两个有关可用读取字节数可能发生冲突。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The ReadBufferSize property ignores any value smaller than 4096.

trans-unit.source: Because the ReadBufferSize property represents only the Windows-created buffer, it can return a smaller value than the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property, which represents both the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> buffer and the Windows-created buffer.
trans-unit.target: 因为 ReadBufferSize 属性是表示仅 Windows 创建的缓冲区，它可返回较小的值比<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>属性，表示同时<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>缓冲区和 Windows 创建缓冲区。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区大小，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4096; the maximum value is that of a positive int, or 2147483647.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 4096;最大值是正整数或 2147483647。

trans-unit.source: The ReadBufferSize value set is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 设置的 ReadBufferSize 值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: The ReadBufferSize property was set while the stream was open.
trans-unit.target: 打开流时设置 ReadBufferSize 属性。

trans-unit.source: The ReadBufferSize property was set to an odd integer value.
trans-unit.target: ReadBufferSize 属性设置为奇数的数字值。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously reads one byte from the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 同步读取一个字节从<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>输入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method reads one byte.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取一个字节。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using ReadByte and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A> together.
trans-unit.target: 请小心使用 ReadByte 和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A>在一起。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Switching between reading bytes and reading characters can cause extra data to be read and/or other unintended behavior.
trans-unit.target: 读取的字节和中读取字符之间切换可能会导致额外的数据要读取和/或其他意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要读取文本和从流中读取二进制数据之间进行切换，选择一种协议，仔细定义文本和二进制数据，如手动读取字节和解码数据之间的边界。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类放入缓冲区的数据，而流中包含<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性不、 两个有关可用读取字节数可能发生冲突。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>属性可以指示字节读取，但不是能访问到流中包含这些字节<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性原因是它们已缓冲到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The byte, cast to an <xref:System.Int32>, or -1 if the end of the stream has been read.
trans-unit.target: 字节，强制转换为<xref:System.Int32>，则为-1 如果已读取流的末尾。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的端口未打开。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously reads one character from the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 同步读取一个字符从<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>输入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: This method reads one complete character based on the encoding.
trans-unit.target: 此方法读取一个完整的字符编码的基础。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A> and ReadChar together.
trans-unit.target: 请小心使用<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>和 ReadChar 组合在一起。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: Switching between reading bytes and reading characters can cause extra data to be read and/or other unintended behavior.
trans-unit.target: 读取的字节和中读取字符之间切换可能会导致额外的数据要读取和/或其他意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要读取文本和从流中读取二进制数据之间进行切换，选择一种协议，仔细定义文本和二进制数据，如手动读取字节和解码数据之间的边界。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, and the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property does not, the two might conflict about how many bytes are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类放入缓冲区的数据，而流中包含<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性不、 两个有关可用读取字节数可能发生冲突。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>属性可以指示字节读取，但不是能访问到流中包含这些字节<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性原因是它们已缓冲到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character that was read.
trans-unit.target: 读取字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的端口未打开。

trans-unit.source: Reads all immediately available bytes, based on the encoding, in both the stream and the input buffer of the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 读取编码的基础，流和输入的缓冲区中的所有立即可用的字节<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the contents of the stream and internal buffer of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object as a string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的流和内部缓冲区的内容<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>字符串形式的对象。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: This method does not use a time-out.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不使用超时。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can leave trailing lead bytes in the internal buffer, which makes the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> value greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法可以保留尾部内部缓冲区，这样中的前导字节<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>值大于零。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要读取文本和从流中读取二进制数据之间进行切换，选择一种协议，仔细定义文本和二进制数据，如手动读取字节和解码数据之间的边界。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class buffers data, but the stream object contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类缓冲数据，但的流对象包含在<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性不。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object and the stream object might differ on the number of bytes that are available to read.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象和流对象可能会与不同的可读取的字节数。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: When bytes are buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property includes these bytes in its value; however, these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当将字节缓冲到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>属性的值中包括这些字节; 但是，这些字节可能无法访问包含中的流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the stream and the input buffer of the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 流和输入的缓冲区的内容<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的端口未打开。

trans-unit.source: Reads up to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine*> value in the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 一直读取到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine*>输入缓冲区中的值。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine*>

trans-unit.source: Note that while this method does not return the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A> value, the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A> value is removed from the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，虽然此方法不返回<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A>值，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A>该值会从输入缓冲区中删除。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the ReadLine method will block until a line is received.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，直到收到一条线，将阻止 ReadLine 方法。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is undesirable, set the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A> property to any non-zero value to force the ReadLine method to throw a <xref:System.TimeoutException> if a line is not available on the port.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要此行为，设置<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A>为任何非零值，以强制 ReadLine 方法会引发<xref:System.TimeoutException>如果某一行在端口上不可用</xref:System.TimeoutException>的属性</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to switch between reading text and reading binary data from the stream, select a protocol that carefully defines the boundary between text and binary data, such as manually reading bytes and decoding the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要读取文本和从流中读取二进制数据之间进行切换，选择一种协议，仔细定义文本和二进制数据，如手动读取字节和解码数据之间的边界。

trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类放入缓冲区的数据，而流中包含<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性不、 两个有关可用读取字节数可能发生冲突。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property can indicate that there are bytes to read, but these bytes might not be accessible to the stream contained in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property because they have been buffered to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>属性可以指示字节读取，但不是能访问到流中包含这些字节<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性原因是它们已缓冲到<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>类。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the input buffer up to the first occurrence of a <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine*> value.
trans-unit.target: 输入缓冲区中直到第一个匹配项的内容<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine*>值。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.NewLine*>

trans-unit.source: The specified port is not open.
trans-unit.target: 指定的端口未打开。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a read operation does not finish.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置读取的操作未完成时发生超时之前的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The read time-out value was originally set at 500 milliseconds in the Win32 Communications API.
trans-unit.target: 最初，读取的超时值被设置为在 Win32 通信 API 中的 500 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set this value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可将此值设置。

trans-unit.source: The time-out can be set to any value greater than zero, or set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>, in which case no time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置为任何值大于零，超时，或将其设置为<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>，在这种情况下不会发生超时。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout> is the default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>默认值。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users of the unmanaged `COMMTIMEOUTS` structure might expect to set the time-out value to zero to suppress time-outs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的非托管用户`COMMTIMEOUTS`结构可能希望将超时值设置为零，以禁止超时。

trans-unit.source: To suppress time-outs with the ReadTimeout property, however, you must specify <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁止显示 ReadTimeout 属性的超时时间，但是，你必须指定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect the <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> method of the stream returned by the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会影响<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>方法返回的流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a read operation does not finish.
trans-unit.target: 读取的操作未完成时发生超时之前的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The read time-out value is less than zero and not equal to <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 读取的超时值小于零且不等于<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 读取一个字符串，直到达到了指定 value 输入缓冲区中。

trans-unit.target: 此方法读取直到达到了指定的字符串`value`。

trans-unit.source: While the returned string does not include the `value`, the `value` is removed from the input buffer.
trans-unit.target: 时返回的字符串未包含`value`、`value`从输入缓冲区中删除。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates where the read operation stops.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示读取的操作停止的位置。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the input buffer up to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 输入缓冲区中直到指定的内容 value 。

trans-unit.target: 长度 value 参数为 0。

trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.target: 指定的端口未打开。

trans-unit.target: 该操作未完成之前的超时期结束。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bytes in the internal input buffer before a <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置前内部输入缓冲区中的字节数<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived"></xref>事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived> event is also raised if an <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData> character is received, regardless of the number of bytes in the internal input buffer and the value of the ReceivedBytesThreshold property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>事件也会引发如果<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData>收到字符时，而不考虑内部输入缓冲区中的字节数和 ReceivedBytesThreshold 属性的值。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the internal input buffer before a <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived"></xref> event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 前内部输入缓冲区中的字节数<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.DataReceived"></xref>激发事件。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: The ReceivedBytesThreshold value is less than or equal to zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Request to Send (RTS) signal is enabled during serial communication.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在串行通信中是否启用请求发送 (RTS) 信号。

trans-unit.source: The Request to Transmit (RTS) signal is typically used in Request to Send/Clear to Send (RTS/CTS) hardware handshaking.
trans-unit.target: 请求发送 (RTS) 信号是通常用于发送/清除的请求中发送 (RTS/CTS) 硬件握手。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable Request to Transmit (RTS); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要启用请求发送 (RTS);否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the RtsEnable property was set or retrieved while the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake*> property is set to the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.Handshake"></xref> value or the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.Handshake"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: RtsEnable 属性的值已设置或检索时<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake*>属性设置为<xref href="System.IO.Ports.Handshake"></xref>值或<xref href="System.IO.Ports.Handshake"></xref>值。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the standard number of stopbits per byte.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的标准停止位数每个字节数。

trans-unit.source: The default value for StopBits is <xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits>.
trans-unit.target: 停止位数的默认值为<xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits>。</xref:System.IO.Ports.StopBits>

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified string to the serial port.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的字符串写入串行端口。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to write a string as output to a serial port.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要作为输出将字符串写入串行端口，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If there are too many bytes in the output buffer and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A> is set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake> then the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object may raise a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> while it waits for the device to be ready to accept more data.
trans-unit.target: 输出缓冲区中是否存在太多字节和<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A>设置为<xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake>则<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>对象可能会引起<xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException>等待设备在准备好接受更多的数据时。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.TimeoutException> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> </xref:System.IO.Ports.Handshake> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Handshake%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> uses <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> to encode the characters.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>使用<xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>字符进行编码。</xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding> encodes all characters greater than 127 as (char)63 or '?'.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>将大于 127 的所有字符都编码为 (char) 63 或？。</xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>

trans-unit.source: To support additional characters in that range, set <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A> to <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, or <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>.
trans-unit.target: 若要支持该范围中的其他字符，将设置<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A>到<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>， <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>，或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>。</xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Encoding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs when a write operation does not finish.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置写入操作未完成时发生超时之前的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The write time-out value was originally set at 500 milliseconds in the Win32 Communications API.
trans-unit.target: 最初，写入超时值被设置为在 Win32 通信 API 中的 500 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set this value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可将此值设置。

trans-unit.source: The time-out can be set to any value greater than zero, or set to <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>, in which case no time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置为任何值大于零，超时，或将其设置为<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>，在这种情况下不会发生超时。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout> is the default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>默认值。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Users of the unmanaged `COMMTIMEOUTS` structure might expect to set the time-out value to zero to suppress time-outs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的非托管用户`COMMTIMEOUTS`结构可能希望将超时值设置为零，以禁止超时。

trans-unit.source: To suppress time-outs with the WriteTimeout property, however, you must specify <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁止显示 WriteTimeout 属性的超时时间，但是，你必须指定<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout>

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect the <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> method of the stream returned by the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会影响<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>方法返回的流<xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>属性。</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds before a time-out occurs.
trans-unit.target: 发生超时之前的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The WriteTimeout value is less than zero and not equal to <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: WriteTimeout 值小于零且不等于<xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.InfiniteTimeout"> </xref>。
